cont.entity_a: Installation of laptop software for shortcut keys caused display issues and slow fingerprint reader response.
cont.entity_b: Initial software installation can be problematic.

cont.entity_a: Fingerprint reader works on Vista but not recognized by many banking sites. Fingerprint software is robust. Fingerprint pad needs regular cleaning or it won't work. Fingerprint reader enhances security and convenience for logins. Does not support domain logins with fingerprint.
Standard layout keyboard has a nice typing feel. Intellikeys require hard pressing and keyboard bends slightly; volume control keys are poor. Keyboard layout is standard.
cont.entity_b: Keyboard keys are soft, quiet, and have a nice feel. Keyboard has many programmable keys and extra controls. Dynamic zoom feature on keyboard is finicky.

cont.entity_a: Wireless mouse is simple and fits well. Mouse design is unergonomical for some users. Mouse occasionally locks up, requiring reconnection. Only the mouse is wireless, not the keyboard.
cont.entity_b: Mouse works on most surfaces and is comfortable, though could be larger. Battery life for mouse is short; recommend using rechargeables. Mouse has good precision and ergonomic design.

cont.entity_a: No drivers for Windows 10, making it incompatible. Not compatible with 64-bit systems or non-Internet Explorer browsers.
Takes two USB ports, lacks integrated wireless receiver.

cont.entity_b: Wireless connection is reliable but not for left-handed use. Keyboard and mouse work flawlessly at a distance of 12 feet.
Soft padding on devices attracts fingerprints.
Overall, good value for money with strong performance and durability.
Battery life for mouse is short; recommend using rechargeables. Battery life shorter than advertised.
Seamless switching between multiple PCs. Highly customizable with third-party software.
